articles.title: Password reset procedure
articles.content:
Steps:
1. Open the sign-in page.
2. Click 'Forgot Password'.
3. Enter your registered email address.
4. Open the email and click the verification link.
5. Choose and confirm a new password.
Notes: Check spam folder if you don't see the email within 5 minutes.

articles.title: Troubleshooting login problems
articles.content: If you can't log in: 1) Confirm your email address; 2) Try reset password; 3) Clear browser cache / app storage; 4) Verify your account isn't locked.

articles.title: Unlocking a locked account
articles.content: Accounts are locked after repeated failed logins. Wait 30 minutes for auto-unlock or contact support to manually unlock. Be ready with your email and last login time.

articles.title: Update email or phone number
articles.content: To change email/phone: go to Account > Profile > Edit. For email changes, we may send a verification link to the new email; follow it to confirm.
